Special Powers

Comments
October 2, 2021
Redrover454
Played her in sealed and she did great. She has a really solid defense and options for what she can do offensively between Giant Reach CCE and PB. She's nothing exceptional, but a solid 50pts and a nice addition to all the other "Don't die" pieces in Brotherhood right now.
August 12, 2021
Goop
If they dont have any penetrating she is incredible for 50pts. Dont even bother with her psyblast, just go for the side step giant reach big hits for 11/4. Just watch out for outwit.
July 12, 2021
toomanybatmans
I like seeing the Acolytes in Clix. Beyond Exodus, Magneto, the Kleinstocks and Unuscione, there are still more that can be made. They are not super powerful and would be good additions - Frenzy in Acolyte armor, Milan, bad Rusty Collins!!, Joseph Magneto, Barnacle, Seamus Mellencamp, Marco Delgado, and Senyaka.
